title: So Long, Lollipops
description: Listening Length: 3 hrs and 12 mins Peter watched his new family drive away, certain it was the last time he'd ever see them. But sometimes plans go awry in the best way. Now, the plan is to get back to them. But sometimes plans go awry in the worst way.Sometimes the only plan is to believe it will be all right, even when it's almost impossible to believe.
author: Sarah Lyons Fleming
